column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Cons: Got lost getting to their restaurant Terzo Piano
column2: took me about 30 minutes walking up and down the stairs
column3: but it was worth the effort
column4: so get very detailed instructions if you are close to missing the lunch (it's only until 3pm). This is super nit picky
column5: but I wish all the art had an audio option
column6: since it enjoyed it so much!!
